summary: DRIVERS SIDE WINDOW MECHANISM BROKEN.  WINDOW FELL WHILE DRIVING ON INTERSTATE.  WHAT WAS FOUND AFTER DOOR INSIDE PANEL TAKEN OFF WAS MANY BROKEN PLASTIC CLIPS.  THESE CLIPS ATTACH TO THE WINDOW AND WINDOW REGULATOR.  AFTER INVESTIGATION THROUGH SEVERAL OLDS DEALERS AND USED CAR PARTS DEALERS WAS THAT THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM FOR WHICH A SERVICE BULLETIN IS IN EFFECT.  OF NOTE, YOU CANNOT PURCHASE REPLACEMENT CLIPS FOR THE WINDOW.  IN ORDER TO CORRECT THE PROBLEM, YOU MUST PURCHASE THE ENTIRE WINDOW MOTOR, REGULATOR AND CLIPS FOR WHICH ARE NOT GUARANTEED TO NOT BREAK AGAIN.  THIS UNIT COSTS OVER $250.  WE FEEL THAT THIS IS A SAFETY VIOLATION DUE TO THE FACT THAT THE SLIGHTEST NICK IN THE WINDOW CAN CAUSE FATAL DAMAGE IF DRIVEN DOWN THE ROAD.
